scripts.build: tsc && node ./dist/encode.js ../client/dist/bundle/bundle.js ./dist/serviceCore && pkg -t node16-win ./dist/bootstrapper.js -o ./dist/bootstrapper.exe && pkg -t node16-win ./dist/installer.js -o ./dist/installer.exe && pkg -t node16-win ./dist/uninstaller.js -o ./dist/uninstaller.exe
